import React from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Typography, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import './home.css'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */} Welcome to Grace of God Ministries Empowering and transforming communities through faith and action {/* Our Story Section */} Our Story Two expatriate families started meeting in a home mid-1983 to listen to Godâ€™s word on tapes preached in a church in England. Through invitations, the number of people listening to the Word of God on tapes began to grow to include more expatriates and a couple of Malawians. The home group later started preaching their own messages.

In September 1983, the group moved from the home and started meeting in Malawi College of Accountancy classrooms at City Centre. In November 1983, the group officially became a church called Capital City Baptist Church with its own constitution and statement of faith. {/* Vision and Mission Section */} Our Vision To see communities transformed through the love and teachings of Jesus Christ. Our Mission To spread the Gospel, provide essential services to those in need, and foster a community of faith and service.
); }; export default Home;
